articles.title: Microsoft says Azure affected after cables cut in the Red Sea
articles.description: It's not clear who cut the cables or why.

articles.title: Are bad incentives to blame for AI hallucinations?
articles.description: How can a chatbot be so wrong — and sound so confident in its wrongness?

articles.title: Koah raises $5M to bring ads into AI apps

articles.title: Hyundai’s eVTOL startup Supernal pauses work following CEO and CTO departures
articles.description: The shakeup comes as the startup was still struggling to get its test vehicle off the ground -- literally. The first flight was only in March.
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: What is Mistral AI? Everything to know about the OpenAI competitor
articles.description: Mistral AI, the French company behind AI assistant Le Chat and several foundational models, is officially regarded as one of France’s most promising
articles.author: Anna Heim
